teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27)

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
www.gerv.net/info/christian-field-partners
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Imaging...
teams.loan_because: We have been “created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared before hand that We should walk in them.” {  Ephesians 2:10 } - Thank You Lord !.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.
